mapper.select: select rownum no, n.*, (select name from member where id = n.writer ) name from (select * from notice order by id) n order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice (id, title, content, writer, filename, filepath) values (seq_notice.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select n.*, (select name from member where id= n.writer) name from notice n where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update notice set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where id = #{id}
